custom.initializing: StableDiffusion / LobeTheme is initializing, please wait...

confirmPageUnload.desc: Helps prevent loss of unsaved data
confirmPageUnload.title: Confirmation on page leaving

customFont.desc: When enabled, it will automatically load a webfont to enhance the display of text in Chinese, English, and code
customFont.title: Custom Font

defaultCardSize.desc: Default value of model cover size when starting
defaultCardSize.title: Model Cover Size

defaultExpand.desc: Whether to expand the sidebar by default when starting
defaultExpand.title: Default Expand

defaultWidth.desc: Default width of the sidebar when starting
defaultWidth.title: Default Width

displayMode.desc: Fixed as grid mode for constant display, auto-expand when the mouse moves to the side in floating mode
displayMode.title: Display Mode

enable.desc: Enable the extra network sidebar on the right side
enable.title: Enable

hideFooter.desc: Hide the theme footer and only display the default footer of stable diffusion webui
hideFooter.title: Hide Footer

imageInfo.desc: Display better image information in the generated image
imageInfo.title: Image Info Alternative

neutralColor.desc: Customize different shades of gray with different color tendencies, the second one is the original Kitchen neutral color
neutralColor.title: Neutral Color

primaryColor.desc: Custom primary color, the second one is the original Kitchen theme color
primaryColor.title: Primary Color

promptDisplayMode.desc: Fixed height or auto height with draggable resize support
promptDisplayMode.title: Prompt Display Mode

promptEditor.desc: Provide a simple prompt editor at the top of the quick setting sidebar
promptEditor.title: Prompt Editor

promptHighlight.desc: Automatically colorize prompt display according to the Stable Diffusion syntax rules
promptHighlight.title: Prompt Syntax Highlighting

defaultExpand.desc: Whether to expand the sidebar by default when starting
defaultExpand.title: Default Expand

defaultWidth.desc: Default width of the sidebar when starting
defaultWidth.title: Default Width

displayMode.desc: Fixed as grid mode for constant display, auto-expand when the mouse moves to the side in floating mode
displayMode.title: Display Mode

enable.desc: Enable the quick setting sidebar on the left side
enable.title: Enable

reduceAnimation.desc: Reduce the blur effect and background flow color, which can improve smoothness and save CPU usage
reduceAnimation.title: Reduce Animation

splitPreviewer.desc: Put the prompt input box on the left and the generate button on the right, ensuring that the generated image is always displayed at the top when scrolling (experimental)
splitPreviewer.title: Split Previewer

svgIcons.desc: Replace all Emoji icons in stable diffusion webui with SVG icons globally
svgIcons.title: SVG Icons

setting.pendingChanges: You have unsaved changes in multiple tabs
